name: Rocats-The (space)road to Cathood
description:
Rocats

Since the dawn of time, there has been a secret ritual known only to cats: The road to Cathood. The ritual demands that young cats,strapped to rockets, battle till death in space to achieve true Cathood.

Now, you can perform the ritual yourself, alone or with a friend!


Anyway, this is a small game I made in about a day, I hope you'll enjoy it for a minute or 5, have fun!
